title: 🍿 "Don’t you ever, ever give up on you." - Sheryl Lee Ralph
content:
Given a set of letter grades, output the GPA (grade point average) of those grades.

Key and examples:

A = 4 grade points
A- = 3.7 grade points
B+ = 3.3 grade points
B = 3 grade points
B- = 2.7 grade points
C+ = 2.3 grade points
C = 2 grade points
C- = 1.7 grade points
D+ = 1.3 grade points
D = 1 grade point
D- = 0.7 grade points
F = 0 grade points
